favourite.article: I have everything Lord, I have YOU!
I have everything Lord, I have You!
We don't want a good life, we want You!
Lord, You are my only goal! Lord, I only live for You! Lord, I only want You!
Hallelujah! I have everything; Lord, I have You!
Lord, You are my only goal.... Amen.
Lord l never would replace You and no more good life but You Lord.

Attempted translation into Spanish, first stanza, DISFRUTEN HERMANOS,
Senor, Tu mi unica meta y mi esperanza Solo me importas Tu No podria reemplazarte Y nunca lo quisiera hacer Senor lo tengo todo Te tengo a Ti!
(Faltan los acentos y ~)
AMEN!!! Praise the Lord. Please translate into Spanish this song!!!!!!!
Lord Jesus truly You are my only goal and my only hope. I have everything Lord because I have You.

Now has come salvation and strength and th kingdom of our God and the authoriy of Christ. For the accusser of our brethren is cast down. Who accused him before our God day and night. And they overcame him by the blood of the Lamb and by the word of their testimony and they loved not their soul life unto death. Therefore rejoice, rejoice, rejoice!
Praise Him! I only live for Him. I have no other goal but to see our lovely Bridegroom's face.
Amen! The Lord Jesus should ONLY and always be our goal in everything! Let's keep enjoying the Lord through hymn singing. :)
Lord, You are my ONLY goal, my ONLY hope. I only care for You! No more good intentions, no more right or wrong, I don't want a "good life" I want You!!!
